Detailed Description

template<class T>
class Factorial< T >

A template class for precomputation and subsequent retrieval of factorials of an integer number.

The maximal input parameter is set to 19 at first, since double and __int64 can represent exactly numbers of 18 or less digits. There is an option to change this in case one uses a data type being capable of representing bigger numbers.
